meanings.definition: Not noticing or paying attention to something.
meanings.sent1: The nonobservant student missed the important announcement.
meanings.sent2: She is usually nonobservant of the small details in her surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The nonobservant squirrel didn't see the acorn right in front of it.
meanings.sent4: His nonobservant behavior led to missing out on a great opportunity.
meanings.sent5: Being nonobservant can sometimes result in overlooking crucial information.

meanings.definition: Failing to adhere to religious practices or traditions.
meanings.sent1: The nonobservant family rarely attends church on Sundays.
meanings.sent2: He is known for being nonobservant during religious holidays.
meanings.sent3: The nonobservant monk accidentally ate meat on a fasting day.
meanings.sent4: Her nonobservant attitude towards prayers raised eyebrows in the community.
meanings.sent5: Choosing to be nonobservant of customs can sometimes lead to misunderstandings.
